nodes.excerpt: The imagi app turns learning how to code into a fun, creative, and social experience! Beginners can level up their coding skills while creating pixel art, and share their creations with a supportive community of fellow imagiCoders.
nodes.title: imagi - Inspire kids to create with code

nodes.excerpt: Improve your mental health and wellness with simple daily activities in Whole! The app focuses on promoting self-care by encouraging users to check in daily and complete habits and tasks that are scientifically proven to improve your mental health.
nodes.title: Whole - Self care habit builder to improve your mental health

nodes.excerpt: KidHab is a collaborative parent-child app which helps develop useful habits in an entertaining way. A unique gamification system will motivate your child to perform useful habits regurarly otherwise the progress is lost if the lessons are missed.
nodes.title: KidHab - Develop useful habits in your kid together
nodes.author: Bogdan Nikolaevich

nodes.excerpt: Live Game Streaming Platform for kids to learn their favourite science topics like:- Black Holes, Alien Life, Dinosaurs etc

nodes.excerpt: Strive teaches K12 math through code via live 1-1 online classes. In Strive classes, students code games and visualisations that are aligned to their school math syllabus. In the process, kids learn the most valuable skill in the 21st century: coding.
nodes.title: Strive - Make K12 math fun via online 1-1 coding classes
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: SparkStudio.co teaches Art, Music & Communication through 1:4 (teacher:student) live classes; along curriculum designed by experts/artists. - 100% Online - Minimal parent involvement - Kids create in & outside class - Individual attention + friendships!
nodes.title: SparkStudio - Online extracurricular classes for 5-15 year olds
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: 1. Scan your pile of Legos 2. We'll show you what you can build with the bricks you have. 3. Choose the idea that catches your fancy and follow our handy instructions.
nodes.title: Brickit - Use ML to detect what can be built from your pile of legos

nodes.excerpt: Cats are unique and incredible creatures beyond a doubt. It is not always easy to understand them. You can find special techniques to communicate with your cat in this e-book. It is completely free!
nodes.title: Healthy Relationship With Cats - Build a healthy relationship with your cat

nodes.excerpt: Traditional dictionaries help you search words, but fail to make you retain them. â € Lockcard is designed so that for every word you search, you are tested on how well you remember them over time, via quiz notifications. Download Lockcard now, it's free!
nodes.title: Lockcard - a new Dictionary - Form a habit of retaining new words

nodes.excerpt: The potty training app for kids and parents. Turn your child into a potty trained whiz in no time! Encourage your child, keep track of activities and make potty training a fun interactive process.
nodes.title: Potty Whiz - The potty training app for kids and parents

nodes.excerpt: TeenUP was created to give kids a platform to learn new skills each day from their peers. The app allows kids to quickly and easily create short, unique, educational videos to share with friends and the world.
nodes.title: TeenUp - A learning platform designed for teens by teens

nodes.excerpt: Kidato is an online school for K-12 kids in Africa. We started by offering after-school classes but now parents are using us to completely replace brick-and-mortar schools.
nodes.title: Kidato - Kidato is an online school for K-12 kids in Africa
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Bring your drawings to life and create your own flipbook animations with FlipKit! Whether you are a beginner or a professional, FlipKit provides you all the tools needed to start animating. Be inspired by one our fun examples.
nodes.title: FlipKit - Create your own flipbook animations

nodes.excerpt: 1Question asks a quick study question before granting children access to their favorite apps...like sneaking vegetables into cake! Instead of complete restriction, 1Question creates unlimited opportunities for children to learn as they play.
